programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Emma Willis hosts the latest eviction, revealing which of this week's nominees the public have voted out, then chatting to them about their time on the show, who they think voted for them and why they feel it was their time to go. But before that, there's the question of seeing how they've all been getting on in the regular round-up.(n)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle UK
programme.sub-title: Lip Sync Battle UK: Rufus Hound v Jorgie Porter.
programme.desc: The musical game show sees comedian Rufus Hound and actress Jorgie Porter go head to head lip-synching to a hit song, complete with dance moves, facial expressions and costumes. Presented by former Spice Girl Melanie Brown and her co-host, rapper Professor Green.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice to a Perthshire woman whose split-level bungalow in Crieff has been on the market for five years. Ann thinks too much clutter is the problem, and quickly sets to work redecorating the hallway, kitchen and lounge, before moving on to the front garden to increase its `kerb appeal'.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Tim Marlow profiles scientist, engineer, inventor and painter Leonardo da Vinci, whose extraordinary artistic genius gave rise to masterpieces including the Mona Lisa, the Annunciation and the Last Supper. Breaking new ground in portraiture and historical imagery, this giant of the Italian Renaissance used his wide-ranging skills to make a unique contribution to the development of European art.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: A storm spreads Pasty's belongings all over the beach, and after seeing him frantically trying to pick things up, Pip and Alba decide to make him a backpack.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The playful primate goes for a trip on a lifeboat and does his best to stay afloat.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: The whack-a-clown game proves no match for Mr Stubborn.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a drain.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George's favourite toy Mr Dinosaur breaks, so he goes to Mr Fox's shop to get a replacement and spots Dino Roar - which has a host of new features.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Mavis the pig does not think she looks good enough to dance at the summer party, so Wissper summons super-smart Stripes the tiger to help.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the Paw Patrol team rescue Alex when he speeds away on his new trike.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob and the team build a monorail system for Spring City, chaos ensues after Leo is left in charge.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Celebrations to mark the Wholefish Cafe's millionth customer do not go to plan.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: The friends get stuck in a muddy puddle while taking part in a rally, and fellow racer Jethro comes to their aid.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Meg has lost her cat Crockett, so Olly searches Bumpton for it.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Marshall becomes a true hero during a competition to win the trophy for fastest fire pup when he is called upon to put out a real fire during a race.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Zeg gets blasted into a mud pit by a geyser, so Blaze and AJ turn to new engineering designs inspired by their dinosaur-truck pals to rescue him from his predicament.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Pink Lettuces.
programme.desc: When Smartysaurus reveals that she had a special request for pink paint, the Ninjas admit to turning the lettuces into pom-poms to cheer on Pink Ninja in her marathon attempt.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Peggy the penguin gets upset when Wissper is too busy to play with her.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Nanny Plum conjures up a hamster for the twins, but the naughty new pet causes chaos in the castle.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Leah loses Zac's toy dinosaur and asks the genies to provide a replacement - only for them to conjure up a real prehistoric monster.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster decides to take over Maid's responsibilities on her day off.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue.
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's train breaks down while her passengers are trying to get to work, so Grandpa Pig lends her his train, Gertrude.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Dr Hamster judges a pet competition at the playgroup, but choosing the best entry proves difficult.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to remove a spider from the house.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle competes with the elves to build a rocket that can fly to the moon.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Turtle team hunts for their Sensei, but soon realizes they are being hunted as well.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Cats Make You Laugh Out Loud 2.
programme.desc: Compilation of videos from the internet featuring animals doing bizarre and humorous things, beginning with a selection featuring cats. Participants include Viva, the star of a viral Batman spoof that clocked up seven million hits on YouTube, and Lil Bub, second only to Grumpy Cat as the internet's most famous moggy. Presenters Dave Spikey and Zoe Lyons are joined by animal behaviour therapist Professor Peter Neville, who provides a little scientific background to the displays.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jenno joins the takedown of a man suspected to be armed, while Dan and Gordy hit the door of a suspected drug den. Meanwhile, Ian arrests a driver who is so drunk that he cannot even put his shoes on the right feet, and Steve rushes to help a pregnant woman caught in a three-car collision.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jim and the team take to the road to spring a trap on suspected drug dealers, while Dan and Gordy track down a man seen roaming the streets armed with two knives. John picks up the pieces of a multicar pile-up, and an early morning raid sees officers break down doors in search of class-A drugs.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Sean uses a manual battering ram on a raid on a drug dealer's house, while Jim's pursuit of a speeding driver leads to some narcotic-related discoveries and there is a high-speed chase through the streets of Macclesfield. Jenno gets a faceful of pepper spray, Jim has to deal with a mouthy drink driver, and Tom hunts down a violent armed robber.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: Giovanni and his family found the perfect place to run their tourist maze in the Snowdonia National Park - but when they sold a house on their land to Terence, the two men soon found themselves at loggerheads. Plus, a man who was looking forward to a new start when he moved into a flat in Chester, only for his downstairs neighbour to disturb his peace with all-night parties, and a Luton woman who became so fed up of her neighbour's noise pollution, she decided to fight fire with fire.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: The story of Lesley, who returned to the quiet cul de sac in Flintshire where she grew up, only to end up in conflict with her neighbours over her drop kerb and driveway, which they thought nothing of driving up to reach the grass verges. And it seemed nothing would deter them. Plus, a man embroiled in a dispute due to a condition that he said caused him to shout abuse in his sleep, and two neighbours whose initial friendship ended in a fist fight - leaving one of them battered, bruised and fearing for his life.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Paul and Steve discover a locked wooden case when they are called to evict tenants from a flat in London's Docklands. Opening it up, they realise they urgently need police back-up - and the property quickly becomes a crime scene. Brian and Graham head to Swindon Town FC to collect a debt, while Paul's team arrives at a property in Essex to find that they have to remove a woman and her six children.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Enforcement officers are faced with the difficult job of evicting a woman with two children - a task that takes a turn for the worse when her ex-partner makes an appearance. In Liverpool, locals threaten a riot over an unpaid debt at a computer shop, while two agents come across an extremely rare car in the course of their duties.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents chase almost £3,000 owed by Indian takeaway owners, but when the staff deny any knowledge of the debt, the agents threaten to seize kitchen equipment. In east London they face a race against time to recover more than £8,000 from an electrical services company, and in Cheshire the enforcement agents chase nearly £4,000 of debt owed by a mobile phone shop.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: First Test Day Three.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the third day's play in the First Test of the four-match series, which took place at Lord's. With commentary by Graeme Smith, Geoffrey Boycott, Simon Hughes, Michael Vaughan and Mark Nicholas.(n)

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: Paul O'Grady gives more lovelorn singletons a chance at romance. Manchester-based recruitment consultant Antoni must choose which of three self-assured ladies he would like to date, while Alice, a Celine Dion super-fan hopes her musical obsession will not stop her finding a girlfriend on her wavelength.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother. Featuring games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat, as well as reactions to the latest eviction. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Live Boxing
programme.sub-title: Live Championship Boxing: Josh Taylor v Ohara Davies.
programme.desc: Josh Taylor v Ohara Davies. Coverage of the bout for the Commonwealth Super Lightweight title, which takes place at Braehead Arena in Glasgow. Taylor has won all nine of his fights since turning professional after claiming gold at the 2014 Commonwealth Games, and is expected to face his toughest opponent in Davies, who is undefeated in 15 contests and claimed an impressive stoppage victory over Derry Mathews last time out. Presented by Paul Dempsey, with commentary from Dave Farah and Richie Woodhall.(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Piper Perabo stars in this musical romantic romp about a songwriter who tries to make it in Manhattan. When music-business doors slam in her face, she takes a job in a rowdy pub where female bartenders whip the crowd into a frenzy with sexy shenanigans. Maria Bello, Adam Garcia, Izabella Miko, Tyra Banks, Bridget Moynahan(n)

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: Ensemble comedy and romance from six Seattle dwellers on the fringes of the city's music scene. Campbell Scott and Bridget Fonda lead a strong cast in a film directed by Cameron Crowe, the man behind Jerry Maguire(n)

programme.title: The Second Arrival
programme.desc: Imaginative sequel to the 1996 sci-fi hit, about a computer programmer (Patrick Muldoon) working for the National Space Agency in Montreal. He discovers evidence of an alien conspiracy against Earth, but can't get anyone to believe him. Michael Sarrazin, Jane Sibbett, Catherine Blythe, Michael Scherer. Directed by Kevin Tenney(n)

programme.title: The Signal
programme.desc: Three bright young students venture deep into the Nevada desert in search of a notorious hacker, and discover they have been drawn into an enigmatic plot with terrifying repercussions in this mind-bending sci-fi thriller. Intrigued by reports that a mysterious hacker named Nomad has breached MIT's advanced security system and exposed its flaws, freshmen Nic (Brenton Thwaites) and Jonah (Beau Knapp) hop in the car with Nick's girlfriend Hailey (Olivia Cooke), and attempt to track down the elusive computer genius. Eventually, the trail of clues leads the three students deep into the Nevada desert. There, they finally come face-to-face with Nomad just before everything goes black. Later, regaining consciousness in a high-security government facility, a confused Nic quickly finds that the worst is yet to come. Laurence Fishburne co-stars(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy isn't about to stand idly by as the planet is purged by a demonic despot, and with a little help from his team at the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defence, he may just be able to send our otherworldly overlords packing(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the live action adaptation of the Marvel comic strip about an alienated teen who is bitten by a genetically altered spider during a school outing and subsequently develops superhuman powers. After an accident, Dr Otto Octavius takes on the guise of evil Dr Octopus and tries to defeat the superhero. Meanwhile, the son of the Green Goblin seeks revenge over Spider-Man, whom he blames for his father's death(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: The successful franchise of Paramount motion pictures based on novelist Tom Clancy's techno-thrillers featuring heroic CIA intelligence analyst Jack Ryan stages a much-publicized "do-over" with this action-adventure that recasts the character of Ryan as a rookie to the complex game of geopolitical warfare. Ben Affleck takes the reins from Harrison Ford as Ryan, a greenhorn CIA historian and analyst who finds himself thrust front and center into the spy community's spotlight when Nemerov (Ciaran Hinds), a Russian politician on whom Ryan is an expert, suddenly becomes the leader of the former Soviet Union upon the current president's unexpected demise. Attached to the director of the CIA, Cabot (Morgan Freeman), Ryan insists -- contrary to the opinions of many high-ranking White House officials -- that Nemerov is not a warmonger. Meanwhile, a cadre of neo-fascists, led by Dressler (Alan Bates), plots the detonation at the Super Bowl in Baltimore, MD, of a nuclear device recovered from a long-ago Israeli fighter jet crash, a terrorist incident they intend to spark a war between the super powers, leaving them to conquer the world in the conflict's post-apocalyptic vacuum. The Sum of All Fears co-stars James Cromwell, Bridget Moynahan, and Liev Schreiber as covert operative John Clark, a character central to another series of Clancy's best-selling tomes(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in Harold Becker's film as Frank Morrison, the ex-husband of Susan, now married to wealthy industrialist and pillar of the community Rick Barnes. But when her son sees the seemingly placid Barnes kill an ex-colleague, he has to persuade his dad that he and Susan are next in line(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: In this intense drama, a neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother(n)

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: Arthur and Norma Lewis receive a mysterious box that will grant them $1 million if they push the button inside, but they must debate if that's worth the consequence of killing a random person(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: Oliver Stone takes on professional football, a sport whose grace and delicacy are a good match for his filmmaking style. Tony D'Amato (Al Pacino), the head coach of the Miami Sharks, won back-to-back championships four years ago. But new team owner Christina Pagniacci (Cameron Diaz) has little enthusiasm for the finer points of the game and is concerned only with the bottom line. The longtime strongman of Tony's team has been "Cap" Rooney (Dennis Quaid), a 39-year-old quarterback, but Christina balks at renewing his contract. When Cap is injured during a game, third-string rookie quarterback Willie Beaman (Jamie Foxx) goes on in his place and becomes a major star. But Beaman is mostly interested in fame and money, and he has little regard for Tony and his teammates. Any Given Sunday also stars James Woods as the team's doctor, LL Cool J as a star running back, Jim Brown as a former football great turned Sharks' defensive coordinator, Ann-Margret as Christina's alcoholic mother, Bill Bellamy as a wide receiver, Elizabeth Berkley as Tony's favorite prostitute, and Charlton Heston as the football commissioner(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
programme.desc: A vulgar but vibrant detective spoof in which a Los Angeles private eye tries to find the link between a missing girl, the murder of a heavy-metal star and the electrocution of a friend. Starring controversial stand-up comic Andrew Dice Clay(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Based on the popular series of books by Darren Shan, Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant tells the story of a small-town teen who inadvertently shatters a 200-year-old truce between warring factions of vampires. Sixteen-year-old Darren (Chris Massoglia) is your typical adolescent; he spends most of his time with his best friend, Steve (Josh Hutcherson), earns decent grades, and generally manages to stay out of trouble. But trouble finds Darren when he and Steve make the acquaintance of a vampire named Larten Crepsley (John C. Reilly) while attending a traveling freak show at a local theater. Transformed into a bloodsucker by Crepsley, Darren joins the Cirque Du Freak and quickly ingratiates himself with the unusual cast of characters who populate it, including Madame Truska the Bearded Lady (Salma Hayek) and the traveling sideshow's towering barker (Ken Watanabe). As Darren works to master his newfound powers as a budding member of the supernatural underworld, he becomes a valued pawn between the vampires and their deadlier rivals, the Vampaneze. With tensions between the two sects intensifying, Darren must figure out a means of keeping the coming war from destroying his last vestige of humanity. Patrick Fugit, Orlando Jones, Willem Dafoe, and Jane Krakowski co-star(n)

programme.title: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li
programme.desc: As the *Street Fighter saga celebrates its 20th anniversary, fight fans are invited to follow along with fearsome fighter Chun-Li (Smallville's Kristin Kreuk) as she faces off against a series of formidable opponents in this feature adaptation of the popular video-game franchise directed by Exit Wounds' Andrzej Bartkowiak. Previously adapted for the screen in the 1994 Jean-Claude Van Damme film, the series continues to thrive as eager gamers across the globe go toe-to-toe to determine who is the most skilled and powerful warrior in the video-game universe. Michael Clarke Duncan, Chris Klein, Rick Yune, and Neal McDonough co-star in the 20th Century Fox production(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Giant carnivorous worms threaten a desert community in this good-natured spoof of a B-grade 1950s horror movie(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Compelling drama starring an Oscar-winning Matthew McConaughey as a macho rodeo cowboy who is diagnosed with HIV(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and later finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: In this millennial screwball comedy, Tracy (Lola Kirke), a mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke (Greta Gerwig), her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature. Written and Directed by Noah Baumbach(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Comic jewels Tina Fey and Amy Poehler, who once shared the "Saturday Night Live" stage, reunite in this outrageous romp. Fey's a buttoned-down career woman who agrees to let loopy working-class girl Poehler become the surrogate mother of her child. Steve Martin costars as Fey's New Age health-food entrepreneur boss, and Sigourney Weaver is hilarious as a smug director of the surrogacy agency. Written and directed by Michael McCullers, former writer at "SNL."(n)

programme.title: Diner
programme.desc: The autobiographical recollections of writer-director Barry Levinson recount the story of five high-school grads on the brink of adulthood in 1959 Baltimore(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: When four young free divers come upon a legendary shipwreck rumoured to contain millions in gold, they believe their dreams of buried treasure has come true. But nearby on the ocean floor they unearth another, more sinister mystery..(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: When Mark Whitacre discovers that his company is involved in price-fixing, he becomes an informant for the FBI. Convinced he'll be hailed as a hero for his efforts, he agrees to wear a wire and gathers evidence to convict his bosses. Unfortunately, both the case and Whitacre's integrity are compromised when the FBI agents discover that he isn't the saintly figure he made himself out to be(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: Three people dealing with their own experience of the afterlife find their lives intertwining. Drama(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: In this intense drama, a neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart, only to discover she and her new boyfriend have just checked in(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match(n)

programme.desc: "Police Academy" meets "Animal House" in this raucous romp written by and starring the Broken Lizard comedy troupe. Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Soter, Steve Lemme and Erik Stolhanske play Vermont state police officers battling crime and sparring with the local cops, who are trying to get them ousted. Lynda Carter, Daniel von Bargen. Chandrasekhar also directed(n)

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: Peter Gibbons (Ron Livingston) is a computer programmer working for Initech in Houston. Every day, he and his friends Samir (Ajay Naidu) and Michael Bolton (David Herman as not THAT Michael Bolton), suffer endless indignities and humiliations in their soulless workspace from their soulless boss, Bill Lumbergh (Gary Cole). For Peter, stuck in his cookie-cutter apartment with paper-thin walls and IKEA furniture, every day is worse than the one before it -- so every day is the worst of his life. To cap it off, Initech has hired a pair of "efficiency experts" to downsize the company. One Friday night, Peter's soon to be ex-girlfriend Anne (Alexandra Wentworth) forces him to go to an occupational hypnotherapist to relieve work stress. While Peter is under hypnosis, the therapist keels over and dies. As he never snaps out of his hypnotic state, Peter has a new outlook on life. If something annoys him, he just ignores it or walks away from it. He is completely relaxed and enjoying life for the first time in a long time. On Monday, Peter skips work and sleeps in. He gets up for lunch and drives down to a restaurant next to his office and asks the waitress he's had a crush on, Joanna (Jennifer Aniston), on a date. When Peter stops into the office to pick up his organizer, he's called in to talk to the efficiency experts. Relaxed and friendly, Peter charms them as he describes everything wrong with the office, including his boss. Even as Peter now appears at work only as the mood strikes him, the experts decide he's management material and give him a promotion even as they lay off the hardworking Samir and Michael. Peter then convinces his friends to exact revenge on Initech based upon an idea from Superman III. Not everything works out quite as planned. Office Space originated from writer/director Mike Judge's first animated short of the same name, created in 1991. The short was about Milton (reproduced in the film by Stephen Root), a damaged office drone whose complaints and threats about his sufferings go unheeded(n)

programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Body of Evidence: The Tom Capano Trial
programme.desc: Body of Evidence: The Tom Capano Trial. A&E investigates the deadly consequences of unrequited love in the one-hour American Justice: Body of Evidence -- The Tom Capano Trial. Wealthy and well-connected, Tom Capano was still subjected to the torments of the heart. When an affair with Anne Marie Fahey ended badly, he snapped. After murdering his ex-lover, Capano dumped her body in the water, a seemingly clever move. However, Capano never counted on the guilty conscience of his own brother to secure his undoing. The police kept the jealous boyfriend under surveillance until they had the sibling's confession as accomplice. Surprisingly, at trial, Capano himself admitted to removing the body. But, he held onto the claim that Fahey was killed by someone else. Capano was convicted and sentenced to death(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Wittenham Clumps, Oxfordshire: Fertile Soils, Rich Archaeology.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson visits Wittenham to piece together clues to one of the most extensive Iron Age landscapes discovered in Britain. A major feature of the area is a hill fort from which vast expanses of Oxfordshire and the Thames can be seen. However, little is known about a much larger neighbouring prominence less than 150 metres away, so the team tries to uncover its secrets.(n)

programme.title: King Tut's Mystery Tomb Opened

programme.title: Egypt's Mystery Chamber
programme.desc: Investigation into the unearthing of an ancient Egyptian tomb in the Valley of the Kings in 2005, the first burial site found since the discovery of Tutankhamun's resting place in 1922. The film also reveals how experts believe a golden casket retrieved on location may have belonged to the pharaoh's child bride.(n)

programme.title: Egypt's New Tomb Revealed
programme.desc: The excavation of a gold coffin, found in the Valley of the Kings, close to the burial place of Tutankhamun. The discovery of the grave in 2006 was the first in the area for more than 80 years. The expedition, headed by renowned archaeologist Otto Schaden, is revealed in step-by-step detail, including possible answers to the mysteries unearthed along the way.(n)

programme.desc: The powerful secrets of ancient Egypt's female rulers, including Cleopatra, Nefertiti, Nefertari and Hatshepsut, who between them governed the land for 400 years.(n)

programme.title: Sun Pharaoh

programme.title: Nefertiti

programme.title: Lost Mummy of Imhotep

programme.title: Battlefield

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: A search for the remains of Roxburgh, formerly one of Scotland's great medieval centres, which eventually fell into decline and disappeared in the 16th century. Presented by Tony Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Cranborne Chase, Dorset: Brimming with Remains.
programme.desc: The team explores the many delights of Dorset farmer Simon Meadon's fields. Crammed with finds, from a possible Romano-British villa to a Bronze Age boundary ditch, the site is a complex one, and the work is increased by the important discovery of a number of burials. With just three days to unpick thousands of years of history, the experts struggle to unearth what made the area so special.(n)

programme.title: Waking the Dead
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Boyd learns he is being removed from the Cold Case unit. For his final job, he re-opens an investigation into the disappearance of 16 homeless teenagers between 1979 and 1982 - the first case he ever worked on. However, as the team struggles to find any new information, Grace worries about her colleague's reasons for revisiting his past - while a guilt-ridden Sarah becomes desperate to make amends for her role in Boyd's sacking. Sarring Trevor Eve, with Paul McGann.(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Frenemies. Will, Miranda's (Cynthia Nixon) latest man, happens upon the perfect excuse for not showing up for a date when he drops dead. At his wake, a shocked and dismayed Miranda finds some solace when she meets Jim (Dominic Fumusa), an aesthetically pleasing fellow mourner who also happens to be one of Carrie's (Sarah Jessica Parker) exes. Although Carrie warns her that there was a reason she broke up with Jim, Miranda sees him anyway, and then just as quickly sees that he's a complete louse. For her part, Carrie has her hands full when she agrees to teach a seminar about how to meet men to a group of very dissatisfied women whose questions make her realize that for a professional sex columnist, she still has a lot to learn. Meanwhile, Samantha (Kim Cattrall) gives a few sex lessons of her own to Charlotte (Kristin Davis), who is getting nowhere in her attempts to cure Trey (Kyle MacLachlan) of his listless libido. Although Charlotte is disgusted by Samantha's lascivious advice, she discovers that her friend speaks words of wisdom when she reluctantly follows Samantha's instructions and reaps raunchy results(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: What Goes Around Comes Around. Carrie is unnerved by a brush with street crime; Samantha takes an inexperienced university student to bed; Miranda seeks serenity in a bottle on a date; Charlotte gets in a thorny situation with the gardener(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Cock a Doodle Do!. Trey finally rises to the occasion, much to Charlotte's relief, while Samantha wages war on some noisy transexuals who are disturbing her sleep(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The Agony and the Ex-tacy. programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The Real Me. Identity issues rear their ugly heads when Carrie (Sarah Jessica Parker) is asked to appear in a fashion charity show that will include both models and regular people. While Carrie is debating whether or not to exhibit her body to a room full of strangers, Samantha (Kim Cattrall) decides to have nude photos taken of herself. But her insistence that the photos are for herself is compromised by her disgust at the male framer's indifference to them. Miranda (Cynthia Nixon), meanwhile, faces some identity issues of her own when she is asked out by Dave (Daniel Travis), a guy at her gym. Oblivious to her own sex appeal, Miranda finds new self-confidence on her first date with Dave, but when she exudes sexy confidence on their second date, Dave tells her that she's full of herself and that he's lost interest in her. Charlotte's (Kristin Davis) identity issues are limited to her nether regions; after discovering she has a condition known as "vulvodynia," she must come to terms with her inability to appreciate what lies beneath her navel. As for Carrie, after learning that she can keep whatever she models, she decides to appear in the fashion show, only to be outfitted in bejeweled lingerie. No sooner has she stepped onto the catwalk than she falls flat on her face, but her decision to rise to the occasion and finish her catwalk is an act of bravery that inspires all of her friends(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City

programme.title: Britain's Favourite Superhero
programme.desc: Documentary making extensive use of interviews and clips from big-budget Hollywood blockbusters to explore the story of how superheroes - once exclusively found on the pages of comic books - found their way to the silver screen, becoming bankable cinematic icons in the process. A Channel 4 poll outlines which do-gooders the British public have taken to their hearts, and the programme charts the history of big-screen heroics from the release of the ground-breaking Superman: The Movie in 1978 through to the high-profile releases arriving in cinemas in 2016. Along the way, viewers are given a chance to revisit Tim Burton's noir-themed iteration of Batman in the 1990s, the angst-filled antics of the X-Men and Spider-Man in the early noughties, and the far-reaching storylines of Marvel's inter-connected Avengers films. All this culminates as the poll results reveals which five heroes have captured British imaginations to become the nation's favourites.(n)

programme.desc: A cheating ex has left 26-year-old personal trainer Kriss with trust issues and a desire to find a lasting relationship is matched with 18-year-old beauty therapist Ruby, who has a habit of dating bad boys. Retired secretary and all-round lover-of-life Patricia is embarking on a bucket year, which includes a search for a new partner, and she goes on a date with octogenarian Alan, a self-confessed flirt who runs a tennis club.(n)

programme.title: First Dates Abroad
programme.desc: Sharlene is smitten with beefcake Brandon at the Canadian restaurant, but it remains to be seen whether her unusual profession will send him running for the hills.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Ben grows grumpier about all the fuss surrounding the yuletide season, so he makes a wish that the holiday had never existed. However, when his wish is granted, he's completely unprepared for the consequences: Emma's existence is erased and everyone's lives are set on totally different courses.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Note.
programme.desc: Ben starts to suspect that Riley might secretly be in love with Danny and comes up with a plan to find out the truth, while Bonnie takes extreme measures when she experiences financial problems. Comedy following the exploits of a man raising his infant daughter with help from his friends and family. Starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: When Joe lands a job at City Hall, he gets caught up in another potential financial scandal, which could put Mel's career at risk. Meanwhile, Lennox is torn between her boyfriend Zander and Archer, her good-looking co-star who has to kiss her in the school play. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Zander and Ryan begin working on a graphic novel, but Lennox takes all the fun out of the project when she assumes some editorial responsibilities. Meanwhile, Mel attempts to persuade Joe to consider waiting before embarking on a physical relationship with his new partner. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: A raccoon versus a dustcart and a super-fast Smart car both feature among a selection of comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, plus interviews with the people who created them.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Cornwall take part in the culinary challenge, with the first hosts being competitive duo Marie and Gavin, who are more than happy to receive a glowing response from one of their fellow competitors. Next up are 25-year-old Becki and her 55-year-old partner Barry, whose age-gap romance leaves their guests with a lot of questions. Finally, Sam and Nick throw the last party, but their rivals are uneasy ahead of arriving at their home, since the pair spent much of their time during a previous engagement discussing their plans for surviving a zombie apocalypse.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Portsmouth compete, with Claire and Alex kicking things off with an organic, nutritionally balanced meal that satisfies their new-age philosophies.(n)

programme.title: Binky & JP's Baby: Born in Chelsea
programme.desc: Part one of two. Following the Made in Chelsea stars as they become parents, charting the last nerve-wracking weeks of pregnancy and climaxing with the arrival of their daughter.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel gets back in touch with a childhood friend, and as things progress romantically, Joe fears they could actually be relatives. Meanwhile, Lennox faces a moral dilemma when she discovers that her blog's new sponsor participates in unethical labour practices. Guest starring Trevor Donovan.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe accidentally injures Austin during a game of pool, foiling his plan for a romantic weekend away with Mel. Meanwhile, a home-schooled student begins studying with Ryder, but the new arrangement soon turns sour.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel and Austin have different opinions about whether or not to have children, while Joe is confused when his new girlfriend tell him that she only wants a physical relationship with no other commitments. Plus, Lennox enlists Ryder's help when she struggles to write her college admissions essay. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Ryder is upset when he discovers his friends have deleted him from their profiles on social media websites, and Lennox is determined to beat Zander's test scores. Meanwhile, Joe begins to date Mel's high-maintenance friend Anita (Shannon Elizabeth). Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel desperately tries to act like a cool aunt after discovering that Lennox and Zander have taken their relationship to the next level, but Joe just wants to kill the boyfriend. Meanwhile, Ryder's girlfriend Keira is impressed by his undeserved bad boy reputation, but her parents are not. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: After finding out there is only going to be one Hanukkah song in the holiday pageant, Beverly convinces Erica to create the perfect song.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry attempts to prove Beverly wrong in his chemistry class, while Adam needs Erica's advice for his friendship with Emmy. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Barry learn something new about Murray, while Erica's college application has a surprise for Beverly. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam attempts to join the tennis team to stay close to a friend, and Beverly helps Erica go through her post-breakup depression. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica and Barry get jobs at Spencer's Gifts, then Murray insists Adam get a job as well, but Beverly is adamant that he should focus on film-making.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Inspired by the film Ferris Bueller's Day Off, Barry pretends to be ill so that he can avoid school and create an epic day of his own. However, his plans go awry when Adam has exactly the same idea. Charlie Sheen guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: A cocky teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the school's dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj discover actress Summer Glau is on their train while travelling to San Francisco. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is hurt when Professor Proton (Bob Newhart) contacts Leonard for help, so he befriends TV scientist Bill Nye, and Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes a girls' night in making home-made jewellery. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, and Kunal Nayyar.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is bothered by the attention he receives in the wake of his heavy element discovery, but is taken aback when his work is disproved by Leonard. Meanwhile, Raj makes Howard and Bernadette feel inadequate when he stays with them for a week and is the perfect house guest.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon leaves for Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he is away, the rest of the friends decorate for Christmas and reflect on how much he has changed their lives. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard meets up with the woman he kissed during his trip in the hope of setting Penny's mind at ease, while Sheldon films a special episode of Fun with Flags after his break-up with Amy. Bernadette feels guilty about keeping a secret from Penny.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The boys want to become more sporty, so Barry Kripke leads them in a fencing lesson, while Penny, Amy and Bernadette help Stuart, who wants to attract more female customers to the comic-book store.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Raj take a heartbroken Howard to Las Vegas, where they pay a prostitute to spend time with him. Meanwhile, Sheldon finds himself locked out of his apartment and forced to stay the night at Penny's. With guest star Jodi Lynn O'Keefe (Prison Break).(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom

programme.title: Six Feet Under the Savannah
programme.desc: Documentary studying the East African savannah and the habits of the naked mole-rat, which lives in the harsh conditions beneath the surface of the sand and dwells in queen-oriented communities similar to insect societies. The film uses sophisticated slow motion filming techniques and a replica of the animal's habitat in a vivarium to bring the unusual creatures' world to life.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor hunts for blue marlin in the North Atlantic and, in the Canary Islands, samples the dubious marine delicacy of escolar - consumption of which is banned in several countries. Finally he heads to Spain, where he grapples with the wels catfish, which can grow up to 10ft in length.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: David Attenborough describes the annual surge of more than 100 million sardines along South Africa's east coast as inshore waters cool with the arrival of winter. This marine spectacle provides a feast for competing predators including dolphins, whales, sharks and seabirds, but the sardine run has become less predictable in recent years - posing a threat to the creatures that depend on it to survive.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Film-makers Gordon Buchanan and Justine Evans head deep into the mountains of western Burma in search of the sun bear, the Asian golden cat and the clouded leopard. Meanwhile, zoologist Ross Piper and the science team carry on their mission to create a wildlife survey to present to the government of Burma, while undercover filming in a border town leads to a shocking discovery.(n)

programme.title: Wild China
programme.desc: Built to shelter ancient China from hostile barbarians to the north, the Great Wall also serves as a cultural curtain, beyond which can be found a variety of traditions. This programme goes outside the Wall to meet tribes of reindeer herders on the Siberian border, and explores deserts to the north where ruined cities were once bustling staging posts for camel trains on the legendary Silk Road.(n)

programme.title: Why Sharks Attack
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the unusual spate of deadly shark attacks that have gripped Australia in recent years. Do the creatures purposely target humans, or is each assault a tragic case of mistaken identity? Plus, a look at how great white sharks have begun appearing in growing numbers off the beaches of Cape Cod, Massachusetts - where they have rarely been seen for hundreds of years.(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this poignant adaptation of author Phoebe Gloeckner's acclaimed graphic novel of the same name, Minnie Goetze (Bel Powley), a sexually precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to grasp the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend (Alexander Skarsgård). Her newly awakened sexuality manifests itself in a series of encounters with boys at school which she painstakenly recounts her diary. Kristen Wiig, Christopher Meloni, Austin Lyon and Quinn Nagle co-star. Directed by Marielle Heller(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: Gail, an expert at white water rafting, takes her family on a trip down the river to their family's house. Along the way, the family encounters two men who are unexperienced rafters that need to find their friends down river. Later, the family finds out that the pair of men are armed robbers. The men then physically force the family to take them down the river to meet their accomplices. The rafting trip for the family is definitely ruined, but most importantly, their lives are at stake(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: A day in the life of two convenience store clerks. Comedy(n)

programme.desc: In a genetically modified future, a janitor is determined to beat the system and become an astronaut(n)

programme.desc: Young Olive is given a shot at the Little Miss Sunshine beauty pageant in California and manages to coerce her family into driving west in their worn-down VW van(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A band of criminals are assembled for a jewel heist by a kingpin who keeps them anonymous from each other. But when the job goes wrong, the group is left bloodied and panicked, wondering who among them is the rat(n)

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Terror runs deeper than flesh when astronauts Lt. Payton (Dennis Quaid) and Cpl. Bower (Ben Foster) awaken from hypersleep to find that the 60,000 passengers aboard their spacecraft have vanished, and the fate of mankind now rests in their hands(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: To get out of having to attend a sweltering hot football camp in Texas, two Illinois high-school athletes opt to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Comedy about Paul Blart, a man who has missed out on his dream of becoming a respected cop and is settling for patrolling the local mall with delusions of grandeur. He takes his role very seriously, much to the chagrin of his colleagues, but he gets his chance to impress when a group of thieves raid the mall(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror when Lisa, an office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: Frustrated with their lives, four middle-aged men decide to hit the open road and embark on a motorcycle road trip to California. Trouble strikes when they run into the Del Fuegos, a fierce biker gang, and a series of unfortunate incidents leave the Wild Hogs on the run from the Del Fuegos in New Mexico. Do they have what it takes to stand up to their pursuers? Starring Tim Allen, John Travolta, Martin Lawrence, William H Macy, Ray Liotta, Marisa Tomei(n)

programme.desc: The Baker family's vacation turns into a comical competition with a rival clan in this sequel(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Political comedy in which a prospective state governor's election prospects are jeopardised by his wayward younger brother. Expecting his mischievous sibling to be something of a liability during his campaign, the aspiring politician orders one of his aides to keep him out of the public eye - a task he does not relish(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Mossad agent fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: This drama about a man who takes the law into his own hands was wildly controversial upon first release, sparking much debate about the perceived pro-vigilante stance of the story, and established Charles Bronson as a major box office draw in the United States. Paul Kersey (Charles Bronson) is a liberal architect living in New York City. One day, a group of drug-crazed thugs break into his apartment while he's gone, killing his wife Joanna (Hope Lange) and brutally raping his married daughter, leaving her comatose. When the police are unable to find the culprits, Kersey arms himself and begins patrolling the streets, killing muggers and thieves as he encounters them. While his obsessive search for street justice sickens him at first, in time Kersey begins to enjoy it and becomes a hunted man himself, as Police Detective Frank Ochoa (Vincent Gardenia) tries to find the man who is doing the police's job for them, and a bit too well. Jeff Goldblum made his screen debut as one of the lunatics who attacks Joanna(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: A martial-arts teacher is conned into a money bout after being backed into a financial corner and falling in with a shady promoter(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: West-Coast Turnaround. The Team delivers produce to market for a farmer being driven out of business by a land-hungry rancher. Easterland: Stuart Whitman. Ellen: Devon Ericson. B.A.: Mr. T(n)

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: Disturbing sci-fi thriller by cult director David Cronenberg and starring Jude Law. A virtual reality computer game designer finds her life in danger and must unravel a sinister conspiracy(n)

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: ) Four young men with supernatural powers are given the task of stopping the evil force they released years earlier. But jealousy and suspicion threaten to tear them apart(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: A martial-arts teacher is conned into a money bout after being backed into a financial corner and falling in with a shady promoter(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: Colonel Matrix (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is retired and living peaceably with his 10-year-old daughter (Alyssa Milano) when she is kidnapped by the henchmen of an exiled Latin American dictator. The dictator's plan is to reinstate himself in power by eliminating the president of his country, using Matrix to kill him (or he will kill the kidnapped daughter). Matrix escapes from the plane that is supposed to be carrying him to his mission and then proceeds to go from one violent confrontation to the next as he hunts down the dictator and moves to rescue his daughter. Helping him is Cindy (Rae Dawn Chong), who has her own reasons for wanting the dictator dead(n)

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts star in this thriller about an Interpol agent who teams with a Manhattan Assistant D.A. on a dangerous chase across the globe to expose a powerful bank's financing of terror and war(n)

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: This drama about a man who takes the law into his own hands was wildly controversial upon first release, sparking much debate about the perceived pro-vigilante stance of the story, and established Charles Bronson as a major box office draw in the United States. Paul Kersey (Charles Bronson) is a liberal architect living in New York City. One day, a group of drug-crazed thugs break into his apartment while he's gone, killing his wife Joanna (Hope Lange) and brutally raping his married daughter, leaving her comatose. When the police are unable to find the culprits, Kersey arms himself and begins patrolling the streets, killing muggers and thieves as he encounters them. While his obsessive search for street justice sickens him at first, in time Kersey begins to enjoy it and becomes a hunted man himself, as Police Detective Frank Ochoa (Vincent Gardenia) tries to find the man who is doing the police's job for them, and a bit too well. Jeff Goldblum made his screen debut as one of the lunatics who attacks Joanna(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: ) Four young men with supernatural powers are given the task of stopping the evil force they released years earlier. But jealousy and suspicion threaten to tear them apart(n)

programme.desc: Fast-paced action thriller about a Vietnam veteran, now a melon farmer, who incurs the wrath of the local mob when he foils a jailbreak attempt by one of their men(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Science fiction adventure in which a futuristic, militarised Earth is threatened by regiments of giant insects from outer space. When an idealistic teenager enlists in the army in order to become a citizen, he is put through a brutal training programme to prepare him for the horrors of war. Sent to the distant planet Klendaathu, he and his fellow troopers fight the deadly enemy force(n)

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: A hero cop accidentally leads his team into a trap from which he is the only survivor. Drowning his guilt in booze, he is eventually assigned a new younger partner who turns out to have his own secrets(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: Although it fizzles at first, this true story of a 1945 mission to free Allied POWs in the Philippines during World War II sizzles once the daring rescue gets under way(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Perhaps the most highly anticipated film of 2003, Kill Bill Vol. 1 marked the return of renowned filmmaker Quentin Tarantino after a six-year hiatus. Re-teaming the director with Uma Thurman for the first time since 1994's Pulp Fiction, the film was originally the first half of what was to be a three-hour-plus movie before being split into two films. Thurman stars as The Bride, one-fifth of a team of assassins called DiVAS. When The Bride opts to leave the outfit for a life of marital bliss, it doesn't sit well with her boss, Bill (David Carradine), so he has her former cohorts, played by Lucy Liu, Vivica A. Fox, Daryl Hannah, and Michael Madsen, show up at the nuptials, leaving behind a blood bath. Miraculously, The Bride survives a bullet to the head and, four years later, she sets out for revenge against her four assassins and their employer. The story is concluded in Kill Bill Vol. 2, released six months later(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's violent samurai sequel starring Uma Thurman as a vengeful assassin. The Deadly Viper Assassination Squad stands in the way of the Bride's nemesis, Bill(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Kirk Wong directed this comedy actioner about mild-mannered, beleaguered hitman Melvin Smiley (Mark Wahlberg), who very much wants to be liked. However, the naive Mel is being taken advantage of by both his girlfriends and associates (who cheat him out of his bonuses). Mel and his "Odd Squad" -- Cisco (Lou Diamond Phillips), Crunch (Bokeem Woodbine), Vince (Antonio Sabato Jr.), and Gump (Robin Dunne) -- work for Paris (Avery Brooks), head of an international crime cartel and a contractor for hit jobs. Mel's mistress Chantel (Lela Rochon), who views him as a meal ticket, lives rent-free in his house, misspends his money, and is continually thinking of ways to get more from him. Her latest scheme is concocting tales about overdue mortgage and car payments, but she really wants the money to run away with her lover Sergio. Mel and his team head into a big shootout to waste some rival mobsters. One person kills the electricity; the others don night-vision goggles. Melvin handles most of the action, including shooting while bungee-bouncing near a staircase, finally making a spectacular bungee-exit from the top floors of the building just as it explodes in flames. A quick and easy weekend job backfires when their kidnap victim, a rich industrialist's teenage daughter Keiko Nishi (China Chow), turns out to be the godchild of their boss, crime czar Paris. When Cisco, mastermind of the plan, is summoned by Paris, he manages to shift blame to Mel. Meanwhile, Chantel absconds with Mel's earnings just as the disapproving parents (Elliott Gould, Lainie Kazan) of Mel's fiancee Pam (Christina Applegate) are due for a visit. Since Pam gave her parents $50,000 from Mel's bank account, they're on their way to thank him and hopefully benefit from another financial windfall. As his professional and domestic woes collide, Mel finds himself dodging bullets while trying to impress his potential in-laws. Throw in an overzealous video-store clerk demanding the return of an overdue tape (King Kong Returns), and it's not long before Mel's life starts to unravel(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Perhaps the most highly anticipated film of 2003, Kill Bill Vol. 1 marked the return of renowned filmmaker Quentin Tarantino after a six-year hiatus. Re-teaming the director with Uma Thurman for the first time since 1994's Pulp Fiction, the film was originally the first half of what was to be a three-hour-plus movie before being split into two films. Thurman stars as The Bride, one-fifth of a team of assassins called DiVAS. When The Bride opts to leave the outfit for a life of marital bliss, it doesn't sit well with her boss, Bill (David Carradine), so he has her former cohorts, played by Lucy Liu, Vivica A. Fox, Daryl Hannah, and Michael Madsen, show up at the nuptials, leaving behind a blood bath. Miraculously, The Bride survives a bullet to the head and, four years later, she sets out for revenge against her four assassins and their employer. The story is concluded in Kill Bill Vol. 2, released six months later(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Red Herring.
programme.desc: Widowed mother Natalie Teeger calls on Adrian and asks him to help clear her of murdering a prowler. As the investigation proceeds, she finds herself being railroaded into replacing Sharona as his new assistant. Drama, starring Tony Shalhoub and Traylor Howard.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is called to a nightclub car park where an undercover policewoman has been shot, and discovers she was trying to obtain incriminating evidence against a drug kingpin - whose henchmen later kidnap him. His only chance of escape lies in playing a psychological game with the dead woman's partner, who appears to have begun to identify with her underworld contacts so closely that she has changed sides and become a criminal.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A former American football star's assistant dies in a car bomb, which Jane believes was intended for the sportsman, so he sets up a ruse to make the killer believe the attack was successful and the athlete is dead. The team compiles a list of suspects and tries to draw out the criminal at a memorial service, but the investigators uncover a long list of enemies with different motives. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is called to the scene of a fireman's death, but is knocked unconscious while searching for the murder weapon and almost drowns in a pond, which causes him to lose his memory and revert to his former con-artist self. Rigsby takes him under his wing, convinced the only way to get him firing on all cylinders again is to bring him back into the CBI fold. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Owain Yeoman.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A lawyer is killed in an explosion on his boat, leaving the team to find out that he was accused of cheating by a mob boss, so Cho goes undercover at one of the criminal's gaming nights to see what he can learn. Back at CBI headquarters, FBI Agent Darcy has been assigned to re-examine the case of serial killer Panzer, but Jane believes her life is in danger when Red John sends them doctored footage of her. Crime drama, guest starring Catherine Dent and Rudolf Martin, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team members are forced to reopen a botched murder investigation from three years previously as they attempt to get a pyromaniac serial killer safely behind bars. Meanwhile, Taylor continues to wage his political war on Brenda's rank. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Robert Gossett.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A complaint is filed against Brenda, which threatens her career in the squad, but when Captain Pope offers to help, she is dubious about his intentions. Meanwhile, the detectives are kept busy trying to trace the killer of a Hollywood producer. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The pressure is on for Brenda and her team to solve the murder of a police detective, but as evidence points to one of their own, the Deputy Police Chief struggles to match DNA samples that could prove their case. However, it becomes clear Gabriel and Daniels' relationship to the victim is key to understanding the crime. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When a juror dies during the trial of a Mob boss, Brenda has her work cut out questioning the remainder of the jury, while an unannounced visit puts her plans with Fritz on hold. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is killed by a stolen surveillance drone and the team links it to elusive terrorist Benham Parsa. NCIS joins forces with the Department of Defence to track down the device before it is used for a large-scale attack, but Gibbs is less than pleased that he has to work with his ex-lover Hollis Mann. Meanwhile, McGee hopes he will be granted time off to attend a black-tie gala honouring his girlfriend Delilah. Guest starring Susanna Thompson (Arrow).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence gleaned from the drone attack which has killed six people and wounded a further 22. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a port authority officer reveals Parsa's possible whereabouts as the team continues the hunt for the terrorist intent on wiping out NCIS. Bishop reveals her past association with the quarry and suggests where she thinks he may be found, but the CIA has intercepted a call that places Parsa in a different location to Ellie's hunch. Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team uncovers faulty bulletproof vests in an abandoned truck filled with stolen USMC merchandise, and attempts to locate the source of the cargo and any vests that could have been sent to military personnel overseas. Crime drama, guest starring Challen Cates, with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine sergeant falls to her death from a building, and when Gibbs and his team examine the circumstances, the woman's doctor urges him to consider this a murder investigation.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The team tackles jury bias against a woman on trial for the murder of a star athlete, who she previously accused of assaulting her. Meanwhile, Benny encounters an old flame.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: One If by Clam, Two If by Sea.
programme.desc: A hurricane sweeps through Quahog and damages the Drunken Clam - which is then bought at a knock-down price by an opportunistic expat Brit who angers the locals by turning it into an English-themed pub. Meanwhile, Stewie tries to teach the new landlord's three-year-old daughter how to speak proper English.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg tries to get friendly with the in-crowd at school, but becomes the target of their cruel mockery. Peter competes against Chris in a variety of winter pursuits, including a skating race and the unusual `kitchenware on face and head' contest - but there is a surprise in store for him.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger believes his identity has been stolen when his credit card unexpectedly reaches its limit, and sets out to catch the criminal. However, after a few days of playing detective, he realises things are not quite what they seem. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Wendy Schaal.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan gets a new position as his boss's adviser and is delighted to accommodate his every request. However, the job begins to threaten his personal life and Francine is roped in to help complete an outrageous task, ruining her plans to spend Valentine's Day with her husband.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter realises Chris is utterly irresponsible, and tries to rectify matters by getting him a job at the local golf course, hoping he will benefit from being entrusted with regular adult duties. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part one of two. Brian is awarded a prestigious job as a sniffer dog for the Quahog police department, only to suffer the embarrassment of becoming addicted to cocaine and referred to a rehabilitation clinic.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger releases photographs of himself to the media, prompting the CIA to form an Alien Task Force to deal with the situation. A twist of fate sees the authorities place the hapless extraterrestrial in charge of the operation - and his new position makes him one of Stan's superiors. Meanwhile, Francine gets to grips with being left-handed.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: Stanny Slickers 2: The Legend of Ollie's Gold.
programme.desc: A close encounter with death prompts Stan to put his dream of finding Oliver North's buried treasure into effect, and he heads off in search of fame and fortune. At home, Steve creates a robotic girlfriend, and Hayley turns to body piercing.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brian moves into his cousin Jasper's Hollywood apartment and tries to start a career in screenwriting. Things are slow taking off, and he spends some time washing cars and working as a waiter to make ends meet. When his break finally comes, it is not quite what he had in mind.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter becomes the president of a cigarette company that uses toy products to promote smoking among children. Lois initially urges him to take a stand against the policy - but the perks of his new job soon persuade her to drop her opposition.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The Smiths are unaware Roger plans to become `king of spring break' by inviting students to party at their home. Meanwhile, Steve tries to lose his virginity and Stan is attracted to a vivacious new friend.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: On Roger's 1,600th birthday, Steve announces he is going through puberty. With Hayley's transition still fresh in the memory, Stan plots to avert any trouble caused by his son's raging hormones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when marine corporal Flegman is found shot to death, and a phone leads them to a hotel room where Gibbs awkwardly stumbles upon his ex-wife Diane Sterling and her FBI agent ex-husband TC Fornell. She had been attempting to call her boyfriend Eddie to break up with him, but somehow Flegman had taken possession of his phone. The team tracks down Eddie's car and discovers a clown nose along with traces of blood and he quickly becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb plot is uncovered following a death at a Quantico reunion, and tensions in the squad room cause trouble for Torres and Quinn as they settle into their new jobs.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine sergeant falls to her death from a building, and when Gibbs and his team examine the circumstances, the woman's doctor urges him to consider this a murder investigation.(n)

programme.desc: In a bid to get his old team-mates back together, Patrick decides to pit them against his new work colleagues in a challenge to solve the murder of a fitness trainer. Meanwhile, Lisbon visits Red John's wife Sally at her home, only to discover she has committed suicide. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: One of Patrick's former clients gets in touch with him when her nine-year-old son is kidnapped and demands that he use his psychic powers to help find the child, despite Lisbon's scepticism. The investigation leads to relatives of the boy, but things get complicated when the main suspect is killed.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team are assigned to protect the mayor during a rally about immigration rights. While searching the area, they find the body of a photographer who has been robbed and murdered. The investigation initially seems to point to a homeless man, but when the memory card in the victim's camera is found to have a close-up picture of the killer on it, the team races to prevent an imminent murder.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a girl on an island and discovers the victim had been conducting inquiries into her father's murder. Jane gathers the town residents for a meeting and tells them he knows the killer is among them, but his suspicions are badly received by the locals. Starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.sub-title: Where in the World Is Carmine O'Brien?.
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a police chief, and Lisbon is in for a surprise when her bounty hunter brother Tommy and his daughter turn up unexpectedly. programme.title: Inspector Clouseau
programme.desc: The famously inept but accidentally brilliant Inspector Clouseau returns to help foil a group of daring robbers in this comedy, the only film in the long-running series not to feature Peter Sellers as the bumbling inspector. Instead, the talented Alan Arkin assumes the role, blundering his way through the expected series of absurd, slapstick situations. The plot centers on a series of Swiss bank robberies under investigation by an uptight Scotland Yard inspector (Patrick Cargill), who naturally becomes infuriated by Clouseau's unwelcome intervention. Meanwhile, the robbers decide to confuse matters by wearing Clouseau masks, offering further opportunities for farcical mistaken identities. Due to the absence of both Sellers and director Blake Edwards, Inspector Clouseau has largely been forgotten in comparison to the other Pink Panther films, though it maintains some interest as a curious aberration in the popular comic series(n)

programme.title: Marvel's The Avengers
programme.desc: Marvel Studios delivers the ultimate comic-book film, which ties together such characters as Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), The Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), and Thor (Chris Hemsworth) for a big-screen franchise team-up like no other. Taking center stage this time is Nick Fury (played once again by the note-perfect Samuel L. Jackson), leader of the peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D. Fury, along with former Russian spy Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson), recruits a super team to combat Thor's ever-deceptive brother Loki (Tom Hiddleston) after he brainwashes ace archer Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) while stealing a cosmic cube from an underground base. Thus the heroes must learn to work together alongside outlaw scientist Bruce Banner (Ruffalo), who can track down the artifact's gamma signals when he's not hulking out into a giant green monster. Show runner Joss Whedon (Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Firefly) adapted and helmed the script by Zak Penn(n)

Taking center stage this time is Nick Fury (played once again by the note-perfect Samuel L. Jackson), leader of the peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D. Fury, along with former Russian spy Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson), recruits a super team to combat Thor's ever-deceptive brother Loki (Tom Hiddleston) after he brainwashes ace archer Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) while stealing a cosmic cube from an underground base. Thus the heroes must learn to work together alongside outlaw scientist Bruce Banner (Ruffalo), who can track down the artifact's gamma signals when he's not hulking out into a giant green monster.
