programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Unless he comes up with $50,000, Peter and his Average Joe's Gym will be swallowed up by White Goodman's bodybuilding empire. His only chance is to take a team of no-hopers to the national dodgeball finals, and a bruising showdown with White. Anarchic comedy(n)

programme.title: From Russia with Love
programme.desc: James Bond battles sinister organisation SPECTRE for a Russian decoding machine, falling foul of evil agent Rosa Klebb and her muscular minion Red Grant(n)

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die
programme.desc: John Tucker is a high school basketball star dating three different girls at the same time: the activist vegan, the over-achieving blonde journalist, and the sassy cheerleading squad captain. They all find out about each other and with the help of the shy new girl in school, Kate, they plot a devious revenge. The girls decide to combine their knowledge to make Kate into the perfect seduction machine and break Tucker's heart(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Unless he comes up with $50,000, Peter and his Average Joe's Gym will be swallowed up by White Goodman's bodybuilding empire. His only chance is to take a team of no-hopers to the national dodgeball finals, and a bruising showdown with White. Anarchic comedy(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Life goes haywire for yuppie Matthew Broderick when manic TV man Jim Carrey knocks on the door. He wanted an installer, not a stalker!(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life seriously one more. Martial arts action(n)

programme.title: Mallrats
programme.desc: Comedy about a pair of hip teenagers trying to get through life. TS and Brodie retreat to the safety of the local shopping mall after disagreements with their girlfriends, Brandi and Rene(n)

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: Four sets of strangers experience life, love, fortune and fame in the Italian capital. Romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Musical romance set in 19th-century Paris with Nicole Kidman as a singer and Ewan McGregor as the writer who loves her(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war(n)

programme.title: Rust and Bone
programme.desc: A struggling single father helps a beautiful whale trainer recover her will to live following a terrible accident that leaves her confined to a wheelchair. Lonely and destitute, Ali (Matthias Schoenaerts) leaves the north of France for his sister's house in Antibes after becoming the sole guardian of his estranged five-year-old son Sam. When Ali lands a job as a bouncer in a nearby nightclub, things quickly start to look up for the itinerant father and son. Then one night, after breaking up a fight in the club, Ali meets the radiant Stephanie (Marion Cotillard), and slips her his number after dropping her off safely at home. Though Stephanie's position on the high end of the social spectrum makes romance an unlikely prospect for the pair, a tragic accident at Marineland robs her of her legs, and finds her reaching out in desperation to Ali. Her spirit broken by the same tragedy that took her legs, Stephanie gradually finds the courage to go on living trough transcendent moments spent with Ali -- a man with precious little pity, but an enormous love of life(n)

programme.title: Kill Your Darlings
programme.desc: Daniel Radcliffe stars as Beat Generation icon Allen Ginsberg in this biopic set during the famed poet's early years at Columbia University, and centering on a murder investigation involving Ginsberg, his handsome classmate Lucien Carr, and fellow Beat author William S. Burroughs. The year is 1944. Ginsberg (Radcliffe) is a young student at Columbia University when he falls hopelessly under the spell of charismatic classmate Carr (Dane DeHaan). Alongside Carr, Ginsberg manages to strike up friendships with aspiring writers William S. Burroughs (Ben Foster) and Jack Kerouac (Jack Huston) that would cast conformity to the wind, and serve as the foundation of the Beat movement. Meanwhile, an older outsider named David Kammerer falls deeply and madly in love with the impossibly cool Carr. Later, when Kammerer dies under mysterious circumstances, police arrest Kerouac, Burroughs, and Carr as potential suspects, paving the way for an investigation that would have a major impact on the lives of the three emerging artists. Jennifer Jason Leigh, Kyra Sedgwick, David Cross, and Michael C. Hall co-star(n)

programme.title: Imagining Argentina
programme.desc: Emma Thompson and Antonio Banderas give moving performances in this powerful political thriller set in 1970s Buenos Aires. She's a crusading journalist who is abducted by the police; he's the husband trying to rescue her. Director Christopher Hampton also wrote the screenplay, which was adapted from Lawrence Thornton's novel. Ruben Blades, Leticia Dolera, Claire Bloom, Maria Canals(n)

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: An idealistic German prosecutor becomes interested in the case of a schoolteacher who once worked at Auschwitz. In time, the prosecutor attempts to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp(n)

programme.title: Blue Jasmine
programme.desc: Woody Allen trades New York City for San Francisco with his comedy-drama Blue Jasmine, starring Cate Blanchett as a troubled former Manhattanite who moves to the City by the Bay to live with her sister after her wealthy husband divorces her. Forced to put her life back together piece by piece while under the effect of powerful anti-depressants, she dates a series of men, attempts to build a career, and slowly learns how to count on herself to survive. Alec Baldwin, Louis C.K., and Bobby Cannavale co-star(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A grief counsellor begins to suspect foul play when the six airplane crash survivors she is tending to mysteriously begin to disappear and the truth behind the tragedy grows ever more clouded in NINE LIVES director Rodrigo Garcia's conspiratorial supernatural thriller(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Smart, funny, sickly and sometimes just plain unconscious, Mark Renton is a hero for our times. Set in an underbelly of Edinburgh the city fathers never dreamed of, Trainspotting is the story of Mark and his so-called friends - a bunch of losers, liars, psychos, thieves and junkies. Hilarious but harrowing, the film charts the disintegration of their friendship as they proceed, seemingly inevitably, towards self-destruction. Mark alone has the insight and opportunity to escape his fate, but then again, does he really want to 'choose life'?(n)

programme.title: Renaissance
programme.desc: An intrepid cop investigates the kidnapping of a young female scientist working for a shadowy mega-corp in 2054 Paris in this noirish sci-fi thriller boasting visually striking rotoscope animation. Voices include Daniel Craig, Catherine McCormack, Ian Holm and Jonathan Pryce. Directed by Christian Volckman(n)

programme.title: Trust the Man
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about two couples fighting to save their relationships. Rebecca is an actress whose marriage to sex addict Tom is falling apart. Meanwhile, Rebecca's brother Tobey is in a long-term relationship with Elaine, but is scared of making a commitment. Will the couples stay together in the face of mounting problems and extramarital temptations?(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Tom Hiddleston stars as country-music legend Hank Williams in this biopic about the performer's rise to stardom and tragic death at the age of 29. During his fascinating life -- from his youthful marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard (Elizabeth Olsen) to his stint on a weekly radio show in Alabama to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry -- Williams struggles with alcoholism and addiction. I Saw the Light received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola makes an impressive feature-film directing debut with this haunting adaptation of Jeffrey Eugenides' novel. Kirsten Dunst stars as one of five doomed sisters in 1970s suburbia who become the objects of obsession for a group of boys in their neighborhood. James Woods, Kathleen Turner(n)

programme.title: Cherish
programme.desc: Finn Taylor wrote and directed this funny and romantic thriller. Robin Tunney plays Zoe, an innocent woman placed under house arrest for vehicular homicide. Tim Blake Nelson is the cop who keeps an eye on her as she tries to find the real killer from home. Brad Hunt, Liz Phair, Nora Dunn(n)

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Shan who is actually the Mermaid, enters the human world in disguise. She eventually makes a rich developer of a beach front, Xuan falls in love with her so as to help her to rescue the mermaids and the other marine creatures(n)

programme.title: Blue Jasmine

programme.desc: An cranky septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: happythankyoumoreplease
programme.desc: Commitment-phobic writer Sam unofficially adopts a boy abandoned by his parents, but this leads to complications when Sam's newest girlfriend, Mississippi, wants to move in with him(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: A Dangerous Method
programme.desc: In this intelligent, engrossing drama, Carl Jung treats a mental patient utilizing the methods of Sigmund Freud. The two men become close colleagues, but their relationship is soured when Jung has an affair with his patient. Directed by David Cronenberg(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola makes an impressive feature-film directing debut with this haunting adaptation of Jeffrey Eugenides' novel. Kirsten Dunst stars as one of five doomed sisters in 1970s suburbia who become the objects of obsession for a group of boys in their neighborhood. James Woods, Kathleen Turner(n)

programme.title: The Bronze
programme.desc: A former Olympic gymnast, still clinging to her fame as a bronze-medal winner, is forced to train an up-and-coming tumbler. However, she tries to sabotage the young athlete in order to preserve her own small-town celebrity in this wacky comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: An aging rocker discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon, which inspires him to give up his hard-living ways and reconnect with his estranged son(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: An cranky septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
programme.desc: John Cameron Mitchell co-wrote, directed and stars in this adaptation of his off-Broadway play about the trials and tribulations of an embittered transsexual rock singer touring the country(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Salma Hayek and Penélope Cruz star in this ripping Comedy-Western about two Mexican beauties who become outlaws to avenge the deaths of their fathers, who were murdered by a ruthless robber baron (Dwight Yoakam). Sam Shepard and Steve Zahn costar as members of their gang. Directed by Joachim Roenning and Espen Sandberg. Filmmaker Luc Besson co-wrote the script with Robert Mark Kamen. Denis Arndt, Audra Blaser, Karl Braun, Ismael Carlo, Carlos Cervantes(n)

programme.title: Two Girls and a Guy
programme.desc: This provocative comedy-drama examines the situation confronting two women (Heather Graham, Natasha Gregson Wagner) who discover they've been dating the same conceited actor (Robert Downey Jr.). They challenge the charming manipulator face-to-face about his arrogant duplicity, but instead find themselves exploring a possible future for their bizarre love triangle. Angel David(n)

programme.title: Down to You
programme.desc: Whimsical and romantic drama starring two of Hollywood's best-looking young leads. Henry Winkler adds humour as a chef, plus there's a cracking soundtrack(n)

programme.title: Grandma's Boy
programme.desc: After his flatmate spends the rent money on Filipino hookers, Alex is forced to stay with his Grandma and her two housemates(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Reeling from personal and professional disappointments, a musician moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Set in the fascinating world of Washington spin, THANK YOU FOR SMOKING sees Nick Naylor lobbying for the tobacco industry and his battle to represent the industry in a positive light(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Hancock is a sarcastic, hard-living and misunderstood superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public. When Hancock grudgingly agrees to an extreme makeover from idealistic publicist Ray Embrey, his life and reputation rise from the ashes and all seems right again, until he meets a woman with similar powers to his and the key to his secret past(n)

programme.title: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
programme.desc: Adam Sandler co-writes and produces this Columbia Pictures comedy starring Nick Swardson as Bucky Larson, a nerd from nowhere who heads out West to become a porn star after finding out his parents were ones themselves. Upon arriving in Hollywood, a waitress (Christina Ricci) with self-esteem issues gets him situated in the slightly less seedy part of town. Meanwhile, Bucky connects with a friend of his parents, Miles Deep (Don Johnson), who pities the backwards man-child and gives him a shot in the world of porn - only to discover that he's severely lacking in both experience and manliness. Through sheer luck, the footage of Bucky becomes a viral hit on the internet and he is propelled to the top of the adult film business, irking the current king of porn actors, Dick Shadow (Stephen Dorff), who'll do anything to not be in the shadow of the small time fool. The Hot Chick's Tom Brady handled directing duties(n)

programme.title: Grandma's Boy
programme.desc: After his flatmate spends the rent money on Filipino hookers, Alex is forced to stay with his Grandma and her two housemates(n)

programme.title: Varsity Blues
programme.desc: A backup quarterback at a West Texas high school steps in for the injured starter and clashes with the gung ho coach(n)

programme.title: The Perez Family
programme.desc: A Cuban plantation owner, imprisoned for 20 years, is finally released in 1980 and allowed to join the boat migration to Florida where he yearns to see his wife and daughter. Circumstances team him up with a fiery young woman, while his wife - who thinks he didn't make the last boat - finally lets herself fall in love with a new man(n)

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Lighthearted romantic tale of down-at-heel waitress Frankie and ex-con cook Johnny, who is smitten by her on his first day at the diner. Despite their initial differences, Johnny's silver-tongued courtship gradually melts away Frankie's icy exterior(n)

programme.title: Pure Luck
programme.desc: A blundering accountant and an obsessive private investigator are thrown together in an unlikely partnership when the accountant's boss launches a search for his daughter. The pair are sent down to Mexico, where the woman disappeared, and embark on a comical quest to track her down... and to survive one another's company(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch and released in America under that title, the two leads bring the same warmth and humour to their roles as their British counterparts. Even sports fans unfamiliar with baseball will know the pain that comes from attending an important function when your team are playing a crucial match(n)

programme.desc: Comedy about a millionaire who goes back to college with his son to show him why and how he should experience the student lifestyle, by throwing the best parties and knowing the right people(n)

programme.desc: A backup quarterback at a West Texas high school steps in for the injured starter and clashes with the gung ho coach(n)

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: Slasher horror remake. Three years after the murder of her family, a girl is finally getting her life back together. But it all falls apart on prom night when the killer returns to finish her off(n)

programme.title: Little Richard
programme.desc: Robert Townsend directed this biopic chronicling the colorful life of rock legend Little Richard (Leon), who scored with hits like "Tutti Frutti" and "Long Tall Sally." Carl: Garrett Morris. Lucille: Tamala Jones. Bud: Carl Lumbly(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as Axel Foley, the loud-mouthed cop from Detroit who's back to shake up Beverly Hills after chief Andrew Bogomil is nearly killed. He teams up again with Det Billy Rosewood, who's acquired an unhealthy appetite for firepower from Foley, and Det Sgt John Taggart, and they set out to crack the 'Alphabet Crimes': robberies from heavily guarded premises. The main suspect is Maxwell Dent, who's protected by heavy Charlie 'Chips' Cain and assassin Karla Fry. And it's not long before the quiet of Beverly Hills is shattered by car chases and shoot-outs in Tony Scott's comedy cop-thriller(n)

programme.title: The Last Supper
programme.desc: Deftly blending pitch-black humour with grippingly intimate storytelling, The Last Supper is a dark comedy of good food, fine wine and potent points of view. Directed by Academy Award nominated Stacy Title, The Last Supper features Cameron Diaz, Annabeth Gish and Ron Eldard as graduate students who want to save the world from the hypothetical horrors of tomorrow. The group holds a lively series of weekly dinner parties, with carefully chosen, politically controversial dinner guests played by Jason Alexander (Seinfeld), Bill Paxton (Twister), Mark Harmon (Wyatt Earp) and Ron PerIman (Beauty and The Beast). Regardless of the conversation, the repast is always delightful, delectable and deadly-with tomatoes picked fresh from the shockingly fertile backyard. This wickedly delicious satire puts a sharp and stylish spin on what's right and left - and right and wrong - in contemporary American politics(n)

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: Slasher horror remake. Three years after the murder of her family, a girl is finally getting her life back together. But it all falls apart on prom night when the killer returns to finish her off(n)

programme.title: The World Is Not Enough
programme.desc: In the 19th James Bond adventure, the suave secret agent is embroiled in a race to defuse an international power struggle, with the world's oil supply hanging in the balance. Following the murder of a tycoon, Bond becomes bodyguard to his daughter, who has been targeted by a psychotic terrorist. Pierce Brosnan's third film as 007(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realises that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: Rhyme & Reason
programme.desc: A compelling, behind-the-scenes look at the world of hip-hop, featuring interviews with stars including Ice-T, Wu Tang Clan, the late Notorious B.I.G. and Salt 'n' Pepa. Also discussed is the controversy surrounding many of the stars' violent lyrics and their influence on society(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as Axel Foley, the loud-mouthed cop from Detroit who's back to shake up Beverly Hills after chief Andrew Bogomil is nearly killed. He teams up again with Det Billy Rosewood, who's acquired an unhealthy appetite for firepower from Foley, and Det Sgt John Taggart, and they set out to crack the 'Alphabet Crimes': robberies from heavily guarded premises. The main suspect is Maxwell Dent, who's protected by heavy Charlie 'Chips' Cain and assassin Karla Fry. And it's not long before the quiet of Beverly Hills is shattered by car chases and shoot-outs in Tony Scott's comedy cop-thriller(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: To win an early release, a convict agrees to go undercover to help a DA gather incriminating evidence on a crime boss(n)

programme.title: Devil
programme.desc: From Executive Producer M. Night Shyamalan comes this thriller about a group of people who become trapped in an elevator and soon realize that one of them is the Devil. What follows is a horrific scenario of claustrophobic suspicion and fear, but unlike other tales of enclosed paranoia, this nightmare is very real. Working from a story by Shyamalan, John Erick Dowdle directs this chilling experience of simple terror(n)

programme.title: D.L. Hughley: Clear
programme.desc: Stand-up comic D.L. Hughley shares his observations on the pros and cons of nosy white neighbors, Colorado's decision to legalize marijuana, and more in this performance from the Regency Ballroom in San Francisco(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Up and coming young lawyer Andrew Beckett has just been fired by his prestigious law firm. His former colleagues claim he's just not good enough; Andrew says he's been fired because he's got AIDS. Determined to defend his professional reputation, Andrew hires fierce, brilliant personal injury attorney Joe Miller to represent him as he sues his former firm for wrongful termination(n)

programme.title: Thunder Soul
programme.desc: Most fans of classic soul and funk don't spend much time listening to high school bands, but mention the Kashmere Stage Band and they'll sit up and take notice. In the 1970s, the jazz band at Houston, Texas' Kashmere High School was one of the best in the nation, and even scored regional hits with their recordings. Comprised of students from one of Houston's roughest neighborhoods, the Kashmere Stage Band was the brainchild of Conrad O. Johnson Sr., the school's band director who replaced the band's staid repertoire with a mix of lively jazz and funk tunes and current R&B favorites, and instilled a powerful work ethic in his students that turned the ensemble into an award winner. Johnson, known to his students as "Prof," transformed an otherwise ordinary band into something ground-breaking, and in the documentary Thunder Soul, filmmaker Mark Landsman offers a telling profile of Johnson and his band, featuring photos and footage of the band in their heyday as well as interviews from a recent reunion in which the Kashmere alumni paid tribute to Prof with their first concert in decades. Thunder Soul received its world premiere at the 2010 South by Southwest Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Roll Bounce
programme.desc: Xavier Smith , known to his friends as X, is a teenager growing up on the South Side of Chicago in the late '70s. X and his buddies are the hotshot skaters at the Palisades Gardens, a neighbourhood roller rink where local kids roll to the latest disco sounds, but X loses his status as king of the hill when the Palisades closes down(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: Children's comedy. A Christmas elf accidentally takes off in Santa's sleigh, crash lands in a small town, and loses the magic toy bag. Beethoven the dog must rescue the elf, recover the bag from greedy crooks, and return the sleigh to Santa in time to save Christmas(n)

programme.title: Dirt Girl World
programme.desc: Wild. The kids go camping(n)

programme.title: Dirt Girl World
programme.desc: Seeds. Dirtgirl and Scrapboy work on their vegetable garden(n)

programme.title: The Trumpet of the Swan
programme.desc: E.B. White's children's story of a swan searching for his voice comes to life in this animated adventure. When young Louie the Swan is hatched, it's soon discovered that he isn't able to make a sound, which is a matter of no small annoyance to his boastful father (voice of Jason Alexander) and doting mother (voice of Mary Steenburgen). As Louie gets a bit older, he falls in love with Serena (voice of Reese Witherspoon), but he has no way of telling her how he feels. Despondent, Louie flies away, and makes friends with a young boy named Sam (voice of Sam Gifaldi). Sam realizes Louie has a problem, and with the help of his schoolteacher, Mrs. Hammerbotham (Carol Burnett), Louie learns to read and write. Louie is thrilled that he has finally found a way to communicate, but his joy is short-lived when he discovers his fellow swans are not well acquainted with the English language. At long last, Louie finds a way to speak in a way his family and fellows can understand when his father gives him a trumpet; while Louie is thrilled and shows a remarkable gift for the instrument, his dad's happiness is diluted by the fact that the horn is stolen merchandise. Determined to pay for the stolen trumpet and make his family proud, Louie flies away to the big city, where he lands a lucrative gig playing with a jazz combo. At last, Louie has found fame, fortune, and self-respect, but can he win the heart of Serena away from her fiancé, Boyd (Seth Green)? The score for The Trumpet of the Swan was written by noted jazz artist Marcus Miller; rock & roll pioneer Little Richard also contributed a song to the soundtrack(n)

programme.title: Angela Anaconda
programme.sub-title: Kar-Lean On Me; Slice of Life
programme.desc: Kar-Lean On Me; Slice of Life. No additional information is available(n)

programme.desc: A Visit to the Bank; A Spot of Fishing; Bear's Job Week. Fearing his money was stolen when his bank is robbed, Paddington goes to take out his savings and he gets a nasty surprise. programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: The Turtle. The kids meet James Bushnell, whose primitive submarine will soon be pressed into service to try to break the British blockade of New York City. Voice of James: Christopher Lundquist. Voice of Franklin: Walter Cronkite(n)

programme.title: Ponyo
programme.desc: Acclaimed anime master Hayao Miyazaki returns for his ninth animated feature with Ponyo, which deals with a friendship between a five-year-old boy and a goldfish princess who yearns to be human. The daughter of the king of the ocean, Ponyo is no ordinary goldfish -- she has all the magic of the sea at her disposal. But when five-year-old Sosuke befriends the spunky little fish near the seaside home he shares with his mother and father, a special connection sparks between the two children, and Ponyo becomes determined to become human. Transforming into a little girl, Ponyo shows up at Sosuke's doorstep, delighted to make herself at home with her new land-dwelling family. But having a magical fish princess walking around on dry land begins setting the mystical balance of the world off kilter, and even though the innocent love Ponyo feels for her dear friend is strong, it will take some help from the greatest powers in the ocean to make things right again(n)

programme.title: Worms
programme.desc: A sheltered, young worm must find his way home after he's mistakenly brought to the surface(n)

programme.title: Ponyo

programme.title: Alpha and Omega
programme.desc: Two mismatched wolves embark on a cross-country quest to get back home and restore peace in their pack after being relocated thousands of miles away by well-meaning park rangers. Quick-witted Humphrey (voice of Justin Long) likes to frolic with friends and play video games with squirrels; disciplined Kate (voice of Hayden Panettiere) likes to call the shots and hunt caribou. Normally, an omega wolf like Humphrey would never stand a chance with an alpha wolf like Kate, but when they're both transported halfway across the country they must work together to get back to their natural habitat. And it won't be easy either, because the one thing Humphrey and Kate can agree on is that they don't have anything in common. Perhaps by working together toward a common goal, however, the two contentious traveling companions will finally realize that even lone wolves can use a helping paw every once in a while. Christina Ricci, Danny Glover, Dennis Hopper, and Larry Miller also supply voices for the Crest Animation production, helmed by Anthony Bell and Ben Gluck from a script by Chris Denk(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: Live-action children's adventure about a canine superhero. A dog is bestowed with special powers in a lab experiment gone wrong. He and his teenage owner then set out to protect their city from the diabolical plans of a mad megalomaniac doctor(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican immigrant working as a maid for an affluent Los Angeles couple has to maintain control of her own daughter, who wants to assimilate(n)

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: This modernization of Edmond Rostand's Cyrano de Bergerac casts Steve Martin as C. D. Bates, the fearless, quick-witted fire chief of a Washington State resort town. Bates' most trusted fireman is the handsome but tongue-tied Chris McDonell (Rick Rossovich). Both men are in love with the beautiful Roxanne Kowalski (Darryl Hannah), but Bates, adorned with a huge nose that makes Bob Hope look like Nanette Fabray, is convinced that he's too homely to win Roxanne's heart. Thus, in the self-sacrificing tradition of Cyrano de Bergerac, Bates courts Roxanne vicariously by feeding his rival Chris the proper romantic words and phrases. The inherent pathos in Roxanne is offset by moments of slapstick, notably the scene wherein C. D. Bates vanquishes a pair of hooligans with a tennis racket. Steve Martin himself is credited with the screenplay for Roxanne, though he generously cites Edmond Rostand as his inspiration(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a baseball talent scout for the New York Yankees who stumbles across a fantastic talent in the wilds of Mexico - but there's a price to pay for the boy's genius. When the scout witnesses the speed at which the boy can throw a ball, he soon realises he must sign him. But the talented chap reveals that he is psychologically disturbed(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Steve Carr's comedy stars Martin Lawrence as Roy McCormick, a basketball coach with anger issues who eventually ends up facing a lengthy ban. His agent suggests a little humility might lessen the blow and gets him a job coaching the Smelters, probably the worst school team in town. At first despairing of a team who can't catch, pass or shoot, McCormick licks them into shape. But on the eve of their big match, he receives an offer to return to top level coaching. Will he take the offer or stay with the Smelters in their hour of need?(n)

programme.title: Hope Floats
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock stars in this winning drama as Birdee Calvert, a Chicago wife and mom who leaves her husband (Michael Pare) and heads home to Texas after he reveals on a talk show that he's having an affair---with her best friend (Rosanna Arquette). Harry Connick Jr., Gena Rowlands, Mae Whitman, Kathy Najimy. Directed by Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Scream 3: La Máscara de la Muerte
Beethoven y El Tesoro Del Pirata
Source Code
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal headlines this sci-fi time-travel thriller directed by Moon's Duncan Jones from a script by Ben Ripley and Billy Ray. A bomb explodes on a Chicago train, derailing the locomotive and killing hundreds. In an attempt to identify the bomber and prevent another, larger attack on downtown Chicago, Captain Colter Stevens (Gyllenhaal) agrees to take part in a clandestine government experiment dubbed "Source Code," which allows him to enter the body of a male passenger during the eight minutes before the man is killed. But during his first trip back, Capt. Stevens fails to gather enough clues to prevent the second attack. With time quickly running out, he repeats the mission ad nauseam in a desperate race to head off one of the most deadly terrorist attacks ever to take place on American soil(n)

programme.title: Killjoys
programme.desc: Boondoggie. In the Season 3 premiere, Dutch and D'avin, with the help of an obnoxious black market dealer, are on the hunt for a weapon that will draw out the Hullen; Johnny receives an SOS from Clara, leading him into the underground world of Hackmods(n)

programme.title: Dark Matter
programme.desc: Give It Up, Princess. The crew must rescue kidnapped royalty to retrieve a file which could halt intergalactic war(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: One More Pallbearer. A millionaire (Joseph Wiseman) offers three personal enemies shelter from an atomic war. Mrs. Langford: Katherine Squire. Hughes: Gage Clark. Hawthorne: Trevor Bardette. Policeman: Ray Galvin. Electrician No. 1: Joseph Elic. Electrician No. 2: Robert Snyder. Host: Rod Serling(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A Little Murder. Grissom suspects murder, not suicide, when the body of a dwarf is found hanging from a rope high above a stage in a casino hotel where a convention of little people is being held. Across town, Catherine is attacked at a crime scene where a man was murdered during what appears to have been a home robbery(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Abra Cadaver. A woman volunteer vanishes during a magic act and never reappears, leaving only traces of blood behind; Catherine probes the apparent fatal overdose of a rock star. Zephyr: Tom Noonan. Punky: Jon Sklaroff. Matilda: Jennifer Sky. Toby: Lawrence Monoson. Keith: Salvator Xuereb. Gus: Blumes Tracy. Samantha: Tushka Bergen. Johnson: Archie Kao(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The Execution of Catherine Willows. Drama series about a team of forensic investigators in Las Vegas. A triple-murder case from 15 years ago comes back to haunt Catherine. Did her testimony put the wrong man on death row?(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Fight Night. Grissom, Sara and Warrick investigate the world of boxing when a fighter dies in the ring. Nick looks into a smash-and-grab robbery at a jewellery store, and Catherine is faced with the consequences of gang violence(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Snuff. Catherine (Marg Helgenberger) investigates when the production of a "faked" snuff film results in the far-from-fake stabbing death of a young woman. Or did a murder actually occur? Clues are either vague or nonexistent, and Catherine finds herself running down a multitude of blind alleys. Meanwhile, Grissom (William L. Petersen) pieces together the evidence when an abandoned aluminum toolbox yields a human skeleton -- infested with imported fire ants(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Blood Lust. Grissom investigates the death of a 14-year-old boy who is pinned beneath the left rear tire of a taxi. The victim is eviscerated and has stab wounds and shows no marks of having been hit by the cab. After the apparent accident, the cabbie is pulled from his vehicle and beaten by a mob(n)

programme.title: Isle of the Dead
programme.desc: A Strike Team battle zombies on a remote tropical island(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich battles zombies and a sinister corporation in this sequel(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: Do we control our destiny, or do unseen forces manipulate us? Matt Damon stars in the thriller The Adjustment Bureau as a man who glimpses the future Fate has planned for him and realizes he wants something else. To get it, he must pursue the only woman he¿s ever loved across, under and through the streets of modern-day New York. On the brink of winning a seat in the U.S. Senate, ambitious politician David Norris (Damon) meets beautiful contemporary ballet dancer Elise Sellas (Emily Blunt)¿a woman like none he¿s ever known. But just as he realizes he¿s falling for her, mysterious men conspire to keep the two apart. David learns he is up against the agents of Fate itself¿the men of The Adjustment Bureau¿who will do everything in their considerable power to prevent David and Elise from being together. Thereafter, each successive scene takes us back in time, culminating with the opening of the story -- 13 years earlier! In between, the action involves a birthday, a wedding, a snowball, and a man with the initials F.D.R. programme.title: Disturbia
programme.desc: Salton Sea director D.J. Caruso travels from the shore to the suburbs for this suspenseful tale of a high-school senior who suspects that his neighbor is a notorious serial killer. Kale (Shia LaBeouf) is a high-school senior who has yet to come to terms with the fact that his father is gone, the tragic victim of a fatal accident. As Kale's mother (Carrie-Anne Moss) struggles to pay the bills by picking up extra shifts at work, her son's behavior grows increasingly erratic. When an altercation at school finds Kale placed under court-ordered house arrest, the homebound student teams with newly arrived girl-next-door Ashley (Sarah Roemer) to investigate the suspicious neighbor (David Morse) whom Kale believes to be an elusive and wanted serial killer. Their attentions focused intensely on the man they believe to be a murderous maniac hiding in broad daylight, Kale and Ashley trespass down a dangerous path while attempting to discern whether his suspicions are grounded in fact or just a combination of deep depression and suffocating cabin fever(n)
